user_instruction: 'Respond to Mark'"'"'s inquiry about the company changes. You can check out my Gmail and my working Note in Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Information on Upcoming Organizational Changes

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Mark has asked for an update regarding the rumored organizational changes at Technotron Solutions. Could you please review any relevant messages in your Gmail, as well as the notes you’ve been compiling in Notion, and share a concise overview of:

• The scope and timeline of the planned changes  
• Any departmental restructuring or role impacts that might affect the project teams  
• Key dates, milestones, or decision points already confirmed  
• Guidance we can pass along to managers and staff in the interim

A brief summary or bullet-point update would be perfect. Once I have this information, I’ll draft an accurate response for Mark.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
